name: Running Blind (Prototype)
description:
Prototyping a game idea: simple platformer, that allows you to hide the screen and play blind (by sound) and beat your best time.

Use the arrow keys to move, the up arrow jumps. The h key hides/shows the screen and the r key resets the level.

I used this free assets in this prototype:

  • Nature Platformer Tileset: https://rottingpixels.itch.io/nature-platformer-tileset
  • Dino Characters by Arks: https://arks.itch.io/dino-characters
  • (2 of the) 500 Sound Effects by Jalastram: https://jalastram.itch.io/500-sound-effects
